front.title: Integrated Service Mappings for Differentiated Services Networks

abstract.t: This document describes mappings of IETF Integrated Services onto IETFdifferentiated services networks. These mappings allow appropriatelyengineered and configured differentiated service network clouds to playthe role of 'network elements' in the Integrated Services framework, andthus to be used as components of an overall end-to-end IntegratedServices QoS solution.
